div.style: float: left; font-size:0.6rem; border: 1px solid black; width: 32%; height: 95%; margin-right: 1%;

td.p:
LACAS School Network
Through Alfalah Transact
Only

hr.style: height: 1px; border-width: 0; color: black; background-color: grey;
height: 1px; border-width: 0; color: black; background-color: black;

td.style: text-align: left; border: 1px solid black; font-size:13px;
text-align: right; border: 1px solid black; font-size:13px;
text-align: left; border: 1px solid black; font-size:13px;
text-align: right; border: 1px solid black; font-size:13px;

table.style: text-align: center; font-size:13px; margin-left: 5%; border-collapse:collapse; width:90%;

td.style: border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey
border: 1px solid grey; text-align: center;color: grey

span.strong: For every subsequent 10 days add Rs500

div.p:
In case of any query please contact the school office or the LACAS accounts department. The amount can be deposited through Cheque of Bank Alfalah or cash at any branch of Bank Alfalah except Alfalah Islamic Branch.
On line payment through ALFA App and Debit/Credit card is also available as per details mentioned on LACAS website. Security is refundable only if one month’s advance notice is given in writing or one month’s advance fee is paid. Security is refundable within 6 months of withdrawal or leaving. For A level students, security is refundable after completion of A level.
